label: I always think negatively even in good situation
When I do something wrong, I think I'm a failure
I think that nothing ever goes my way
When someone compliments my look, I think they are just being nice
I often interpret an event or situation negatively without evidence supporting such a conclusion
I jump to the worst possible conclusion in every scenario
I feel responsible for events that, in reality, are completely or partially out of your control
I feel I have no control at all over anything in my life
I believe I know what’s fair and what isn’t, and it upsets me when other people disagree with me
I feel that others have the power to affect my life, even more so than myself.
I should be better in a lot of things
I believe future events depend on how I feel.
I expect other people will change their ways to suit my expectations or needs, particularly when I pressure them enough.
I judge and then define myself or others based on an isolated event
I see my own opinions as facts of life. This is why I will go to great lengths to prove I'm right.
